title: Why CUSTRA exists: stop screenshotting, start listening
describe: CUSTRA is a local-first capture assistant that automatically saves key frames from your meetings and online classes, so you can stop manually screenshotting slides and focus on listening while still getting a clean, reviewable record of what mattered.

title: No More Screenshot Stress: Zoom Meetings and Online Classes Auto Screenshoot Assistant
describe: This tool helps you free your hands during video meetings and online courses so you can focus on thinking. Currently in beta.
